mapper.insert: insert into crudapp(title, writer, password, contents, id, hit, fileName, regdate) values(#{title}, #{writer},#{password},#{contents},#{id},0,#{fileName},now())
mapper.select: select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rm, crudapp.* from crudapp where (@rownum:=0)=0 order by no desc) crudapp where rm between ((#{page.page}-1)*#{page.pageSize} +1) and (#{page.page}*#{page.pageSize})
